members.name: chip_id
members.brief: Chip Identifier of the device, not the firmware. Set to 0 for DW9787, 0xC401 for CM401, 0xC402 for CM402, etc. The firmware is locked to the chip id.

members.name: fw_uid_l
members.brief: This is the next most significant 2 bytes of the SHA1 Hash of the firmware directory contents at the time of build

members.name: fw_uid_h
members.brief: This is the most significant 2 bytes of the SHA1 Hash of the firmware directory contents at the time of build

members.name: fw_build_config_id
members.brief: Firmware Build Configuration Identifier

members.name: fw_version_major
members.brief: Major version number

members.name: fw_version_minor
members.brief: Minor version number

members.name: fw_version_patch
members.brief: Patch version number

members.name: fw_actuator_id
members.brief: Actuator identifier

members.name: sma_lib_version
members.brief: SHA1 hash of the SMA Servo Library

members.name: sma_config_version
members.brief: SHA1 hash of the SMA Servo Library Configuration

members.name: fw_date
members.brief: Date in YYYYMMDD format (binary-coded decimal)

members.name: fw_time
members.brief: Timestamp in 00HHMMSS format (binary-coded decimal, right-aligned)

members.name: status
members.brief: Status of the topcode firmware. 0x0000 no operation, 0x1001 OIS on, 0x1002 servo on, 0x1000 servo off, 0x2000 calibrating gyro offset, 0x2001 gyro offset calibrated, 0x6000 saving calibration, 0x6001 calibration saved, 0x7000 erasing calibration, 0x7001 calibration erased, 0x8000 loading calibration, 0x8001 calibration loaded.

members.name: active
members.brief: Set to 1 to run the processor.

members.name: control_mode
members.brief: Control Commands for the firmware

members.name: bmi_ex
members.brief: Disable Bosch/ST gyro for power saving. Set to 0x0060 to disable and 0x0006 to re-enable. The firmware then sets this register to 0x0050 disable or 0x0005 enable.

members.name: gyfilt_update
members.brief: Gyro filter update command. Set to 0x8000 to apply the value of registers under coeff_x/y/z structs such as GYRO_FILTER_COEFF_X/Y/Z registers.

members.name: fall_prot_flag
members.brief: Free fall protection flag. Set to 0 for normal operation and 1 when free fall is detected.

members.name: select_clk
members.brief: Select clk source. 0 = Build Default, 1 = Internal, 2 = 19.2MHz, 3 = 24MHz

members.name: siggen_regs
members.brief: TODO

members.name: siggen_params
members.brief: TODO

members.name: gyro_raw
members.brief: TODO

members.name: gyro_out
members.brief: TODO

members.name: acc_raw
members.brief: TODO

members.name: acc_out
members.brief: TODO

members.name: gyro_ofs_status
members.brief: Gyro Offset calibration status.

members.name: gyro_gain
members.brief: Gyro Gain, one per axis (X, Y and Z axes). Q format is unsigned Q3.13.

members.name: gyro_offset
members.brief: Gyro offset from the gyro filter, one per axis (X,Y and Z axes).

members.name: gyro_rot_mat_cos
members.brief: Gyro rotation matrix (X and Y cosine theta). Q format is signed Q1.15.

members.name: gyro_rot_mat_sin
members.brief: Gyro rotation matrix (-X and Y sine theta). Q format is signed Q1.15.

members.name: gyro_orientation_sel
members.brief: Gyro orientation selection.

members.name: gyro_gain_pol
members.brief: Applies polarity to gyro gain. Negative value(-1) for negative gyro gain, positive value(+1) for positive gyro gain.

members.name: sma_calib
members.brief: SMA Factory calibration data area

members.name: intercept_mode
members.brief: Selects whether the device should use SPI Intercept mode instead of the default SPI Master mode. This register should be set before the MCU is activated. A value of 1 enables SPI Intercept mode, 0 sets Master mode.

members.name: pwm_frequency
members.brief: Target PWM frequency in Hz

members.name: temp_adc_min
members.brief: Minimum input ADC value to limit the polynomial fit result

members.name: temp_adc_max
members.brief: Maximum input ADC value to limit the polynomial fit result

members.name: wb_adc_min
members.brief: ADC threshold used in wire break detection. Minimum threshold below which a short circuit is indicated

members.name: wb_adc_max
members.brief: ADC threshold used in wire break detection. Maximum threshold above which an open circuit is indicated

members.name: disable_protection
members.brief: When set to 1, power will not be disabled when temperature, resistance or supply voltage limits are exceeded. Default setting is 0 i.e. power will be disabled when limits are exceeded.

members.name: vm_millivolt_min
members.brief: Minimum input value for actuator supply voltage, specified in mV

members.name: vm_millivolt_max
members.brief: Maximum input value for actuator supply voltage, specified in mV

members.name: vsync_enable
members.brief: Flag to enable Vsync

members.name: pdu_mid_res
members.brief: ADC to resistance middle resistance value

members.name: pdu_res_amp_gain
members.brief: Resistance amplifier gain

members.name: pdu_temp_amp_gain
members.brief: Temperature amplifier gain

members.name: pdu_res_dac_offset
members.brief: Resistance DAC offset

members.name: pdu_temp_dac_offset
members.brief: Temperature DAC offset

members.name: pdu_slew_ctrl
members.brief: Slew control register

members.name: pdu_adc2temp_c0
members.brief: The coefficient C0 in the polynomial fit

members.name: pdu_adc2temp_c1
members.brief: The coefficient C1 in the polynomial fit

members.name: pdu_adc2temp_c2
members.brief: The coefficient C2 in the polynomial fit

members.name: pdu_adc2temp_c3
members.brief: The coefficient C3 in the polynomial fit

members.name: pdu_adc2temp_shift
members.brief: Right bit shift amount used in the polynomial fit calculation

members.name: pdu_adc2temp_adc_min
members.brief: Minimum input ADC value to limit the polynomial fit result

members.name: pdu_adc2temp_adc_max
members.brief: Maximum input ADC value to limit the polynomial fit result

members.name: fra_enable
members.brief: FRA Enable Register. Write 1 to Enable FRA.

members.name: fra_run
members.brief: FRA Control and Status Register. Write 1 = Update params and start FRA. Read 0 = FRA Finished.

members.name: fra_skiptime
members.brief: Warm up period to skip for FRA measurement in milliseconds

members.name: fra_meastime
members.brief: FRA measurement period in milliseconds

members.name: fra_amp
members.brief: FRA Stimulus Amplitude

members.name: fra_freq
members.brief: FRA Stimulus Frequency

members.name: fra_dof
members.brief: Dof on which FRA measurement is performed. 0 => X, 1 => Y, 2 => Z.

members.name: gyro_filter_scaling
members.brief: Parameter used to scale the output of the gyro filter for Super OIS. Signed Q1.14

members.name: tempest_offset
members.brief: Parameter C0 of the Temperature Estimation Model

members.name: tempest_grad
members.brief: Parameter C1 of the Temperature Estimation Model

members.name: tempest_timecoeff
members.brief: Average decay constant for a given actuator. Q0.16

members.name: tempest_terr_gain
members.brief: Determines the gradient of the TERR term. Signed Q13.18

members.name: tempest_terr_offset
members.brief: Determines the offset of the TERR term. Signed Q6.9

members.name: tempest_terr_cutoff
members.brief: Cutoff temperature for function fitting of TERR_0 (1/10 C)

members.name: tempest_terr_cutoff_offset
members.brief: Offset for TERR_0 when above the cutoff temperature. Signed Q6.9

members.name: tempest_rslack_ref
members.brief: The reference slack value found from a batch of actuators

members.name: warmup_timeout
members.brief: The number of servo loops to apply bias for during warmup. If this value is 0 it will default to a 200ms warmup time

members.name: rmid_cal
members.brief: Calibrated centre of resistance used by PosEst

members.name: scm_matrix_values
members.brief: Sensitivity calibration matrix values, in Q3.12

members.name: scm_ffx_matrix_values
members.brief: Sensitivity calibration matrix values for hybrid drive, in Q3.12

members.name: scm_inverse_matrix_values
members.brief: Inversed sensitivity calibration matrix, in Q3.12

members.name: ctrl_features_4ws
members.brief: Bit field used to enable or disable some of the Control features.

members.name: ctrl_prop_gain_d
members.brief: Proportional gain of the control loop in Q8.8 format

members.name: ctrl_poffset_d
members.brief: PDELTA Offset

members.name: ctrl_manual_limit
members.brief: Is the `limit^2` term (in `deltaX^2 + deltaY^2 < limit^2`) for setting the minimum allowed step size in manual mode

members.name: ctrl_ffp_gain
members.brief: Proportional signed gain of Linear Gain Module of the FF path

members.name: ctrl_pad
members.brief: Padding to ensure that the ctrl structs are a multiple of 4 bytes.

members.name: pos_features
members.brief: Enable features in the position estimation model

members.name: pos_filtcoef
members.brief: Filter coefficient for position model. 0 is pass-through while 65536 corresponds to the lowest cut-off frequency.

members.name: pos_gain_correction
members.brief: Gain shortfall correction after the pos estimate filter. In Q2.14

members.name: btm_base
members.brief: Parameter BASE of the Bias Temperature Model

members.name: btm_win
members.brief: Parameter PWIN of the Bias Temperature Model

members.name: btm_grad
members.brief: Parameter GRADIENT of the Bias Temperature Model

members.name: btm_tempinit
members.brief: Parameter TEMPERATURE_INIT of the Bias Temperature Model

members.name: btm_tempwd
members.brief: Parameter TEMPERATURE_WINDDOWN of the Bias Temperature Model

members.name: btm_biasmax
members.brief: The maximum value that BTM_BIAS is permitted to reach to ensure the power window remains open

members.name: btm_w_temp_max
members.brief: user-defined max wire temperature in mW

members.name: btm_max_allowed_power
members.brief: user-defined max bias power. Must not be lower than BTM_BIASMAX.

members.name: rtm_grad
members.brief: Parameter GRADIENT of the Resistance Temperature Model

members.name: rtm_curv
members.brief: Parameter CURVATURE of the Resistance Temperature Model

members.name: rtm_tempinit
members.brief: Reference temperature at which RTM_BASE is the effective RSC (unaffected by gradients)

members.name: rtm_thermalres
members.brief: Parameter THERMAL_RESISTANCE of the Resistance Temperature Model

members.name: rtm_base
members.brief: Parameter BASE of the Resistance Temperature Model

members.name: rtm_pad
members.brief: Padding to ensure 32bits alignement of following structs

members.name: dlf_hotzone
members.brief: Resistance range in which the Firmware cannot be out of control

members.name: dlf_timeout
members.brief: Threshold number of cycles of being in the out of control state before Limit finding is applied

members.name: dlf_vellim
members.brief: Threshold filtered RDelta velocity above which the Firmware will not be considered in the out of control state.

members.name: dlf_errlim
members.brief: Threshold value of DLF_Err below which the Firmware will be considered in the out of control state.

members.name: dlf_backoff
members.brief: How much maximum Resistance demand will be clipped in a Limit finding event

members.name: dlf_pad
members.brief: Ensure 32bits alignment of next struct

members.name: clh_params
members.brief: Parameters for the 4W Closed Loop Hysteresis model

members.name: clh_features
members.brief: Flags to control 4W Closed Loop hysteresis features

members.name: clh_pir
members.brief: Prandtl-Ishliskii (PI) backlash bandwidth

members.name: clh_piweight
members.brief: Prandtl-Ishliskii (PI) backlash weight, in Q4.11

members.name: clh_gain_sf_factor_a
members.brief: Gain shortfall hysteresis scaling factor. Format is Q1.15 fixed point.

members.name: clh_hyst_pad
members.brief: Padding to ensure 32bits alignment of next struct.

members.name: ffh_features
members.brief: Bit field to control feed forward hysteresis feature

members.name: ffh_pir
members.brief: Prandtl-Ishliskii (PI) backlash bandwidth

members.name: ffh_piweight
members.brief: Prandtl-Ishliskii (PI) backlash weight, in Q4.11

members.name: ffh_hyst_pad
members.brief: Padding to ensure 32bits alignment of next struct.

members.name: htm_params
members.brief: Closed loop hysteresis thermal model

members.name: hys_htmmin
members.brief: Minimum wire temperature below which output consists solely of hysteresis compensated rdelta demands

members.name: hys_htmmax
members.brief: Maximum wire temperature above which output consists solely of uncompensated rdelta demands

members.name: hys_htmgrad
members.brief: Mixing grad to determine a combination of hysteresis compensated and uncompensated rdelta demands

members.name: hys_pad
members.brief: Padding for 32bits alignment of next struct.

members.name: arc_denom
members.brief: This register is used to set the nominal resistance for the ARC model. DENOM = 4294967296 / RN.

members.name: arc_features
members.brief: Enable features in the ARC model

members.name: stm_base
members.brief: Parameter BASE of the Stroke Temperature Model

members.name: stm_gradlow
members.brief: Parameter GRADIENT_LOW of the Stroke Temperature Model

members.name: stm_gradhigh
members.brief: Parameter GRADIENT_HIGH of the Stroke Temperature Model

members.name: stm_tempref
members.brief: Parameter reference temperature at which STM_BASE is the effective SWIN (unaffected by gradients)

members.name: ffd_features
members.brief: Bit field to control feed forward dynamic feature

members.name: ffd_alpha_model
members.brief: The alpha model term for the ffd module. In unsigned Q0.16. Maximum value is 0.04 (in floating point)

members.name: ffd_beta_model
members.brief: The beta model term for the ffd module. Integer resolution unsigned. Maximum value is 400

members.name: ffd_pad
members.brief: Padding to ensure 32bits alignment of next struct.

members.name: wire_scalar_to_dof_d
members.brief: scalar coefficient for converting quantity in wire space to dof space

members.name: rlm_rate
members.brief: RLM filter rate in units if [1/cycle]. Q0.16

members.name: rlm_phase_scale
members.brief: Phase scaling for the resistance delta [mW / mOhm]. Q0.8

members.name: rlm_scale_base
members.brief: RLM temperature model BASE scaling [mOhm / mW]. Q7.8

members.name: rlm_scale_grad
members.brief: Parameter BASE of the Resistance Length Model [1 / mW]. Q0.16

members.name: rlm_scale_curv
members.brief: Parameter CURVATURE of the Resistance Length Model [1 / mW^2]. Q0.24

members.name: rlm_pad
members.brief: Padding register to ensure 32 bit alignment of next struct

members.name: pwin_beta
members.brief: The scaling term for calculating the return power when P_BOOST_RETURN is active. Integer resolution.

members.name: ssl_debug_flags
members.brief: Bit field that can be used to enable debug features for SSL

members.name: pwrnorm_g0
members.brief: Coefficient of S(fpwm) in the PWRNORM_GAIN power normalisation calculation.

members.name: pwrnorm_o0
members.brief: Coefficient of S(fpwm) in the PWRNORM_OFFSET power normalisation calculation.

members.name: pwrnorm_o1
members.brief: Coefficient of S(fpwm) in the PWRNORM_OFFSET power normalisation calculation. In signed Q11.20

members.name: pwrnorm_c_same_comm
members.brief: Gain Coefficient for overlapping wire duties on the same common. In unsigned Q1.15

members.name: pwrnorm_c_opp_comm
members.brief: Gain Coefficient for overlapping wire duties on opposing common. In unsigned Q1.15

members.name: pwrnorm_nom_supply_voltage
members.brief: The expected actuator supply voltage. In millivolts. Only valid for DW9787

members.name: lib_major
members.brief: Major version number of CML library as in <major>.<minor>.<patch>-<branch>.<release>

members.name: lib_minor
members.brief: Minor version number of CML library as in <major>.<minor>.<patch>-<branch>.<release>

members.name: lib_patch
members.brief: Patch version number of CML library as in <major>.<minor>.<patch>-<branch>.<release>

members.name: lib_branch
members.brief: Branch version number of CML library as in <major>.<minor>.<patch>-<branch>.<release>

members.name: lib_release
members.brief: Branch version number of CML library as in <major>.<minor>.<patch>-<branch>.<release>

members.name: lib_buildid
members.brief: Build identifier for CML library

members.name: lib_revision
members.brief: Git sha1 of CML library

members.name: params_uid
members.brief: Unique identifier for the parameter file.

members.name: actuator_id
members.brief: Identify the actuator type.

members.name: chip_check
members.brief: readback to indicate chip check status

members.name: wb_break_flag
members.brief: Wire break flags, indicating whether an open/closed circuit was detected for each wire triggering a power down.

members.name: tv_err_flag
members.brief: Temperature validation flag, indicating if an invalid temperature triggered a power down.

members.name: vv_err_flag
members.brief: Supply voltage validation flag, indicating if an invalid actuator supply voltage triggered a power down.

members.name: adc
members.brief: ADC measurements

members.name: fra_real_lo_axis
members.brief: Accumulator real - Lower 4 bytes

members.name: fra_real_hi_axis
members.brief: Accumulator real - Upper 4 bytes

members.name: fra_imag_lo_axis
members.brief: Accumulator imaginary - Lower 4 bytes

members.name: fra_imag_hi_axis
members.brief: Accumulator imaginary - Upper 4 bytes

members.name: params_mode
members.brief: Bitfield to select different param mode of operation

members.name: sma_supply_voltage
members.brief: The measured SMA actuator supply voltage. Only valid for DW9787.

members.name: input_ctrl_4ws
members.brief: Bit field that can be used to enable special debug features

members.name: input_ctrl_pad
members.brief: Padding to ensure so it is easier to write to INPUT_CTRL without overwriting following registers on S10.

members.name: input_pos_d
members.brief: Position Demand used by the library in position units

members.name: input_temp
members.brief: Temperature received by the library.

members.name: input_pad
members.brief: Padding to ensure 32bits alignment of next struct.

members.name: tempest_filtmeas
members.brief: Filtered temperature from the measurement device (1/10 C)

members.name: tempest_adj
members.brief: Temperature offset between the thermometer and the actuator as calculated by the Temperature Estimation Model (1/10 C). In Q15.16

members.name: tempest_tempamb
members.brief: Temperature of the actuator as calculated by the Temperature Estimation Model (1/10 C)

members.name: pos_est
members.brief: Estimated Lens Position

members.name: lim_est
members.brief: Position estimation of DLF limits

members.name: rmid_w
members.brief: Centre of Resistance as calculated by Centre Calibration algorithm (mOhms)

members.name: rslack_avg
members.brief: Slack resistance metric averaged over all wires

members.name: rslack_pad
members.brief: Padding for 32bits alignment of next registers

members.name: rslack_w
members.brief: Slack resistance metric

members.name: rmid_warmupoffset_d
members.brief: The offset between turn on power centre and the persisted RMIDs. This value is used as a compensation offset into the FF chain.

members.name: status
members.brief: Control status

members.name: res_w
members.brief: Wire resistance

members.name: rdelta_d
members.brief: Delta wire resistance in DOF space

members.name: rdeltademandoutput_d
members.brief: Delta resistance demands - output of DLA block

members.name: rdeltaerr_d
members.brief: Delta Resistance Error in dof space

members.name: pdelta_d
members.brief: Delta Power in DOF space

members.name: pwr_w
members.brief: Power applied

members.name: enable_pwr_4ws
members.brief: Status of power output enabled/disabled for each wire

members.name: duty_w
members.brief: Duty applied

members.name: ctrl_ffp_pdelta_d
members.brief: Linear Gain Module for FFP output, per DOF

members.name: counter_main
members.brief: Counter incremented each time the main loop is executed

members.name: counter_pos
members.brief: Counter incremented each time a new position is provided to the library

members.name: btm_bias
members.brief: Power bias applied on all the wires (power units)

members.name: btm_window
members.brief: Power window applied on the forward path (power units)

members.name: btm_power_max
members.brief: max power calulated with given max allowed wire temperature and input temperature

members.name: btm_temp_in_power
members.brief: Ambient temperature in mW equivalent units

members.name: hys_htmeff
members.brief: Mixing factor of rdelta demand and rdelta hysteresis in Q0.16

members.name: dlf_minpdr
members.brief: Minimum resistance delta applied on an axis (mOhms). This is updated every time a limit finding event is found.

members.name: dlf_maxpdr
members.brief: Maximum resistance delta applied on an axis (mOhms). This is updated every time a limit finding event is found.

members.name: dlf_err
members.brief: Filtered RDELTA_ERROR (mOhms). Whilst this is below DLF_ERRLIM Firmware is considered in control

members.name: dlf_vel
members.brief: Filtered RDELTA_VELOCITY (mOhms/cycle). Whilst this is above DLF_VELLIM Firmware is considered in control

members.name: centre_adj
members.brief: Resistance delta in mOhms by which resistance demands are adjusted due to centering from DLF

members.name: clh_rdelta_hyst_a
members.brief: Hysteresis adjusted rdelta demand, per axis.

members.name: clh_adj_a
members.brief: Hysteresis adjustment value, combination of delta applied across the hysteresis block and the gain shortfall corrected delta accross the inverted PI model, per axis.

members.name: ffh_rdelta_hyst_a
members.brief: Hysteresis adjusted rdelta demand, per axis.

members.name: rtm_tempwire
members.brief: Temperature of the wires as calculated by the Resistance Temperature Model (1/10 C)

members.name: rtm_rsceff
members.brief: Scaling factor between TARGET0..1 and RDELTA_DEMAND0..1 as calculated by the Resistance Temperature Model (mOhms per Position Demand unit, in Q8.8 fixed-point)

members.name: rtm_rsceff_inv
members.brief: Inverse of RTM_RSCEFF, in Q8.8 fixed-point

members.name: stm_swineff
members.brief: Stroke window as calculated by the Stoke Temperature Model (Position Demand units)

members.name: stm_rdeltawineff
members.brief: SWIN_EFF multiplied by RSC_EFF

members.name: scm_transform_applied
members.brief: Centered position with transformation matrix applied

members.name: scm_ffx_transform_applied
members.brief: Centered position with transformation matrix applied for hybrid drive

members.name: ffd_alpha_history
members.brief: History of the ffd alpha model, used in a feedback loop. In signed Q10.8

members.name: ffd_pdelta_a
members.brief: Output of the FFD module per axis in power units.

members.name: ffwin_summed_output
members.brief: The output of the module that is the two feedback paths summed together

members.name: ffwin_btm_win_dof
members.brief: Power window applied on the forward path (power units) in dof space

members.name: arc_pdelta_w
members.brief: Delta powers calculated by ARC

members.name: arc_axis_comp_d
members.brief: Axis compensation applied by Arc on all axes.

members.name: rlm_temp_w
members.brief: Power correction per wire (correlated to wire temperature) [mW]

members.name: rlm_res_w
members.brief: Corrected wire resistance used for position feedback

members.name: rlm_temp_w_avg
members.brief: Average wire temperature

members.name: rlm_temp_w_max
members.brief: max temperature among all wires

members.name: rlm_scale_eff
members.brief: Corrected RLM Scale using the average wire temperature

members.name: pwrnorm_gain
members.brief: Gain Coefficient for converting power to duty. In unsigned Q3.13

members.name: pwrnorm_offset
members.brief: Gain Coefficient for converting power to duty. In signed Q6.9
